column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Thank you for your review and 4 star rating!  I do apologize that your server did seem a bit rushed.  I've made a note to the staff about spending the right amount of time with our guests in order to better explain the menu and the products we offer.  Should any of your future experiences be sub par in anyway
column2: please message me. I will see to it that you are well taken care of .
